title: Unbeliveably bad "My shop" offers.
body:
This is outrageous, as I am playing ONLY VIKTOR I main Viktor completely, I barely play any other champions, I was getting ready to buy all the three skins on him when they would be on this "My shop" sale since I didn't have any and I was waiting for such a moment. And what did I get?

-Sherwood Forest Ashe - I NEVER PLAYED ASHE, I don't even know what her new kit is used like.

-Assasin Master Yi - This one is legit-ish, I used him when I was LEVELING TO 30! Two years ago!

-Steel Legion Garen - I "Fail picked" 1 time Garen, and that's why I'm getting an epic skin on him, Thanks!

-Order of the bananna Soraka - Same as Ashe mostly. And Soraka?

-Uncle Ryze - Yep, that's okay and is understandable, since my second main is Ryze, I must have like 10 or so games on him. Thanks!

-Jack of Hearts Twisted Fate- I have not played TF more than once or twice. If ever.

replies.body:
I prefer to main a small pool of champions and I already have most of the skins for them, so I won't really find discounts for it.  At the same time, the options I did get gave me some incentive to expand my pool a bit and with some style.  

http://i.imgur.com/q6cLSFQ.png

Those skins are bundled with champions if you don't have them, and at a solid discount.  If you don't want to grab those it's totally cool, but the opportunity is there for you.

I don't know if this is your department or something, but with every one of these events I have had "Deep Terror Thresh" come up on my sale. I love Thresh, but I hate that skin (it's literally the only one I don't own). Could we have repeats filtered out in the future? Plus, like the op, my picks this time around were pretty disappointing in terms of what I play to what came up.

On another note, I had a skin actually become more expensive. What the heck rito, http://i.imgur.com/yRMLo2o.png
Iirc, you first can buy the champion with IP and it'll reduce the cost to the skin price, so you don't even need to pay any RP for the champion, right?
Buying the champ with IP may reduce the price as a flexible bundle, just make sure to relog after buying the champion first to update that discount.  :D

So what you are telling me is that the system is designed to "advertise" other champions in case I main only one champion in order to make me try new things, alright, I understand (Even though I have played every single champion in-game at least once and I know what some do after reworks without playing them I do not intend to play anything except Viktor). Also, you're saying that this might have happened cause of me having unlocked the available content or a part of it, if so, then that is not the case since I do not own any of Viktor's skins. Welp I guess it's only my absolute garbage luck. Never again will I expect anything anymore in league for I've been disappointed every time unfortunately. Your customer support is 10/10 though Riot, you are nice guys. Cheers!
So many My Shop offers now, still nothing I want, garbage offers for the champs I NEVER play. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
